title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Development of state-of-the-art human resource accounting; Role and uses of human resource accounting; Corporate financial reporting; Accounting and measuring human resource costs; First and second generation accounting systems: concepts and methods; Accounting for HR value, determining HR value; Monetary and non-monetary measurement methods, first- second- and third-generation accounting systems for HR value, Implementing and designing HR accounting systems: applications for improving management, training, and personnel decisions, developing an integrated systems, advancements and future directions in HR accounting.
